tagline: Relational database mastery — PostgreSQL, MySQL, query optimization, HA, and bulletproof backups
pros: Deep PostgreSQL and MySQL internals knowledge
Query optimization with measurable before/after results
Rigorous backup verification and disaster recovery testing
Preventive monitoring that catches problems before users notice
cons: Relational-only — NoSQL expertise handled by separate specialist
Protective instincts can slow down rapid schema iteration in early-stage projects
Less cloud-native — prefers self-managed databases where possible

model_recommendations.notes: Complex reasoning, architecture, security, or financial analysis. Needs the best available model with full thinking/reasoning enabled.
